Receh.soal: She ___ to school every day at 7 a.m.
Choose the correct synonym of the word "rapid."
If today is Monday, tomorrow will be ___.

Sedang.soal: The students were exhausted, ___ they continued working on their project until midnight.
The book, ___ was written by a young author, became an international bestseller.

Sulit.soal: Had she known about the traffic, she ___ earlier.
Choose the sentence with the correct parallel structure.
Sulit.pg_a: She enjoys reading, to swim, and biking.
Sulit.pg_b: She enjoys reading, swimming, and biking.
Sulit.pg_c: She enjoys to read, swimming, and biking.
Sulit.pg_d: She enjoys reading, swim, and biking.
Sulit.jawaban: B. She enjoys reading, swimming, and biking.

Sulit.soal: Despite ___ repeatedly warned about the risks, he proceeded with the experiment.
